com.here.android.mpa.venues3d

Class VenueMapView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.MapView
          • com.here.android.mpa.venues3d.VenueMapView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent, VenueLayerAdapter, com.nokia.maps.MapUi

    public class VenueMapView
extends MapView
implements VenueLayerAdapter
    This class adds support for 3D venues to a map view. It allows Venues such as shopping malls and airports to be shown on the map as interactive 3D models. In addition, it enables the display of spaces inside venues and of venue access information (such as information about entrances).

    An instance of VenueMapFragment must be initialized by calling its VenueMapView.init(Activity, VenueService.VenueServiceListener) method. To enable interactive use an instance of VenueMapLayer, add listeners for relevant events to the it as shown in the example below. 

     VenueMapView m_mapView;
 Map          m_map;

 public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
     // ...other initializations...
     m_mapView = (VenueMapView) findViewById(R.id.mapcanvas);
     MapEngine.getInstance().init(this, m_listener);
     // ... other initializations...
 }

 private OnEngineInitListener m_listener = new OnEngineInitListener() {
     // ...other initializations...
     m_map = new Map();
     m_mapView.setMap(m_map);
     m_mapView.init(m_activity, m_venueServiceListener);
     // ...other initializations...
 }

 private VenueServiceListener m_venueServiceListener = new VenueServiceListener() {

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(android.app.Activity activity,
        VenueService.VenueServiceListener serviceListener)
        Initializes the VenueMapView and VenueService and displays a map that occupies the entire view rectangle.

        Note that even after initialization, most VenueMapView features cannot be used until VenueService is ready. Listen for this ready status by using VenueService.VenueServiceListener.onInitializationCompleted(VenueService.InitStatus).

        Parameters:
        activity -
        serviceListener -

      • onResume

        public void onResume()
        Description copied from class: MapView
        Propagates an activity's onResume() event to the view. Applications can call this method within the onResume() method of any activity which has a MapView as part of its view hierarchy. Note that unlike MapFragment, MapView does not automatically handle the pausing and/or resuming of MapEngine. Owner of MapView is responsible to address the handling of MapEngine.onResume() if needed.
        Overrides:
        onResume in class MapView
        See Also:
        MapFragment.onResume(), MapEngine.onResume()

      • onPause

        public void onPause()
        Description copied from class: MapView
        Propagates an activity's onPause() event to the view. Applications can call this method within the onPause() method of any activity which has a MapView as part of its view hierarchy. Note that unlike MapFragment, MapView does not automatically handle the pausing and/or resuming of MapEngine. Owner of MapView is responsible to address the handling of MapEngine.onPause() if needed.
        Overrides:
        onPause in class MapView
        See Also:
        MapFragment.onPause(), MapEngine.onPause()

      • addListener

        public void addListener(VenueMapFragment.VenueListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: VenueLayerAdapter
        This method adds the VenueMapFragment.VenueListener object provided by the caller to the list of active listeners. The VenueListener object contains method implementations for handling venue- and space-related events, such as selecting and deselecting a venue.
        Specified by:
        addListener in interface VenueLayerAdapter
        Parameters:
        listener - The VenueListener object to be added.
        See Also:
        VenueLayerAdapter.removeListener(VenueMapFragment.VenueListener)

      • removeListener

        public void removeListener(VenueMapFragment.VenueListener listener)
        Description copied from interface: VenueLayerAdapter
        This method removes the VenueMapFragment.VenueListener object provided by the caller from the list of listeners, which receive the venue and space related events.
        Specified by:
        removeListener in interface VenueLayerAdapter
        Parameters:
        listener - The VenueListener object to be removed.
        See Also:
        VenueLayerAdapter.addListener(VenueMapFragment.VenueListener)

      • selectVenue

        public boolean selectVenue(Venue venue)
        Description copied from interface: VenueLayerAdapter
        This method selects the Venue in a 3D view mode. In the 3D view mode, layers and spaces of the venue are visible to the application user. This method opens an already donwloaded venue. VenueMapFragment.VenueListener.onVenueSelected(Venue) callback method is called when the venue has been selected.
        Specified by:
        selectVenue in interface VenueLayerAdapter
        Parameters:
        venue - An object representing the venue to be selected.
        Returns:
        true, if the venue has been found on the map and opened, otherwise false.

      • selectVenueAsync

        public VenueInfo selectVenueAsync(java.lang.String id)
        Description copied from interface: VenueLayerAdapter
        This method uses the id provided by the caller to select the corresponding venue in a 3D view mode. In the 3D view mode, layers and spaces of the venue are visible for the application user. The method is asynchronous, because the venue must be downloaded if it is not already present in the cache. The callback method VenueMapFragment.VenueListener.onVenueSelected(Venue) is called when the venue have been selected.
        Specified by:
        selectVenueAsync in interface VenueLayerAdapter
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the venue to be selected.
        Returns:
        An object representing the venue info on success, null if no venue was found to match the supplied identifier.
        See Also:
        Venue.getId()

      • selectAsync

        public VenueInfo selectAsync(java.lang.String venueId,
                    java.lang.String spaceId)
        Description copied from interface: VenueLayerAdapter
        This method selects a Venue and a Space within it in a 3D view mode. The venue and space must match their respective ids as provided by the caller. In the 3D view mode layers and spaces of the venue are visible for the application user. The method is asynchronous, because the venue must be downloaded if it is not already present in the cache. VenueMapFragment.VenueListener.onVenueSelected(Venue) callback method is called when the venue have been selected.
        Specified by:
        selectAsync in interface VenueLayerAdapter
        Parameters:
        venueId - The id of the venue to be selected.
        spaceId - The id of the space to be selected. If null, only the venue is selected.
        Returns:
        An object representing the venue info on success, null if no venue was found to match the supplied identifier.
        See Also:
        Venue.getId(), SpatialObject.getId()
